maintainers.description: same as the maintainers object on bazel-central-registry metadata.json files

repository.description: GitHub repository if the string starts with github: - other formats not yet supported

bazel-recommended.description: whether this ruleset is listed on https://bazel.build/rules#recommended-rules

shortname.description: human-readable shorter name for navigation, like rules_pkg is Packaging. Defaults to just title case of the repo name.

load-repository.description: what name this ruleset documents that users should load() its symbols from

bzlmod_names.description: Names of modules in the Bazel Central Registry which are hosted in this repo.
